assignments.description: Set the Post Made Publicly value based on the selected value on the screen.
assignments.name: Assign_Post_Made_Publicly
assignments.label: Assign Post Made Publicly

assignments.description: Set the Post Made Publicly to false as it's null in this case
assignments.name: Assign_Post_Made_Publicly_False
assignments.label: Assign Post Made Publicly False

decisions.description: Check whether the Root Cause has been selected while creating the case escalation.
decisions.name: Check_if_Root_Cause_is_filled
decisions.label: Check if Root Cause is filled

decisions.description: Check if the Post Made Publicly checkbox is null
decisions.name: Check_Post_Made_Publicly
decisions.label: Check Post Made Publicly NULL

decisions.description: If there is already a Case Escalation record update if not create.
decisions.name: Create_Escalation
decisions.label: Create Escalation?

decisions.description: Validate that Values have changed before update.
decisions.name: Have_Values_Changed
decisions.label: Have Values Changed

rules.name: Record_Not_Updated
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND (10 OR 11) AND (12 OR 13) AND 14 AND 15
rules.label: Record Not Updated

Flow.description: Create new Social or executive escalation cases.

recordUpdates.description: Update the Do_not_Auto_Solve__c checkbox on Case to true.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Don_t_auto_solve_checkbox_on_Case_to_True

recordUpdates.description: Update the Do_not_Auto_Solve__c checkbox on case to false
recordUpdates.name: Update_Dont_Auto_Solve_Checkbox_to_False

fields.name: noUpdates
fields.fieldText:
Hi there!


The selections made on the previous screen match the existing Escalation linked to this case. Please make changes on the previous screen to make updates to the existing escalation.

textTemplates.name: ErrorLogEmail
textTemplates.text:
Error Occurred During "Social & Executive Escalation Flow"


Current Stage:

{!$Flow.CurrentStage}


FaultMessage:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}
